warn.advancedchat.savefirst: Any unsaved changes will be lost when pressed!
config.advancedchat.filter.name: Filter Name
config.advancedchat.filter.info.name: What the filter appears as, only cosmetic.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.active: Whether the filter should be filtering chat.
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.litera: Literal: Matches exactly what String to find is
config.advancedchat.info.findtype.regex: Regex: Interperets String to find as a regular expression.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replacet: OnlyMatch: Only replaces what triggers the filter.
String that replaces what you have set for Replace Type.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.notifyty: None: Doesn't notify you when the filter gets triggered.
Sound: Plays a sound when the filter gets triggered.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replacet: Replace text color with replace match.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.replaceb: Replaces line background color with specified color.
config.advancedchat.filter.info.color: Color used in ReplaceBackground and ReplaceTextColor
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.startin: The message that starts when you open chat with this tab open.
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.forward: If the message goes into this chat tab, should it go in others.
config.advancedchat.chattab.name: Chat Tab Name
config.advancedchat.chattab.info.name: What the name of the Chat Tab is. Shows when selecting.
config.advancedchat.chathud.info.emptyte: !BUGGY! Chat color of empty style text.
config.advancedchat.chathud.info.backgro: What the color of the chat hud appears as.
